overview_of_class: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with methods for the collection, analysis and reporting of quantitative information. The course will cover basic concepts in statistics including operationally defining variables, coding quantitative data, reliability and validity of measurement, parametric and non-parametric analyses, and quantitative research designs.
name: Quantitative Research in Music Education
title: MUSIC MUSIC_ED 425-0-1 Quantitative Research in Music Education

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with methods for the collection, analysis and reporting of quantitative information. The course will cover basic concepts in statistics including operationally defining variables, coding quantitative data, reliability and validity of measurement, parametric and non-parametric analyses, and quantitative research designs.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Music_Ed 423 or permission of instructor.

subject: MUSIC_ED
